channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-django-migrations (0.1.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to lint for backwards incompatible database migrations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pyproject-flake8 (0.0.1a2)
item.description: pyproject-flake8 (`pflake8`), a monkey patching wrapper to connect flake8 with pyproject.toml configuration
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pathlib (0.1.4)
item.description: flake8-pathlib is now flake8-use-pathlib
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-use-pathlib (0.2)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding use of functions that can be replaced by pathlib module.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: darglint (1.8)
item.description: A utility for ensuring Google-style docstrings stay up to date with the source code.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (0.1.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-type-checking (0.1.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (21.4.3)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-annotations (2.6.2)
item.description: Flake8 Type Annotation Checks
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pytest-style (1.4.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin checking common style issues or inconsistencies with pytest-based tests.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-tuple-trailing-commas (0.1.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin for enforcing trailing commas in tuples
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-encodings (0.3.4)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to identify incorrect use of encodings.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-name-migrations (0.1)
item.description: Flake8 hook for reminding you to give your Django migrations human readable names
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-encodings (0.3.2)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to identify incorrect use of encodings.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-requirements (1.4)
item.description: Package requirements checker, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: good-smell (0.18)
item.description: A linter/refactoring tool to make your code smell better!
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tabs (2.3.1)
item.description: Tab (or Spaces) indentation style checker for flake
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tabs (2.3)
item.description: Tab (or Spaces) indentation style checker for flake
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-encodings (0.2.2)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to identify incorrect use of encodings.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-multiline-containers (0.0.18)
item.description: Ensure a consistent format for multiline containers.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pyflakes (2.3.1)
item.description: passive checker of Python programs
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-encodings (0.2.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to identify incorrect use of encodings.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-functions-names (0.0.5)
item.description: An extension for flake8 that validates functions names, decomposition and conformity with annotations.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: pyproject-flake8 (0.0.1a1)
item.description: pyproject-flake8 (`pflake8`), a monkey patching wrapper to connect flake8 with pyproject.toml configuration
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-test-name (0.1.5)
item.description: Invalid test name checker, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-functions-names (0.0.3)
item.description: An extension for flake8 that validates functions names, decomposition and conformity with annotations.

item.title: New: flake8-test-name (0.1.1)
item.description: Invalid test name checker, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-strftime (0.3.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin which checks for use of platform specific strftime codes.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-comprehensions (3.4)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to help you write better list/set/dict comprehensions.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-slots (0.1.4)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to require __slots__ to be defined for subclasses of immutable types.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-sphinx-links (0.2.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to check docstrings for double backticked strings which should be links to the Python documentation.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-docstrings (1.6)
item.description: Extension for flake8 which uses pydocstyle to check docstrings
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pytest-flake8dir (2.3.1)
item.description: A pytest fixture for testing flake8 plugins.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-dunder-all (0.1.7)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin and pre-commit hook which checks to ensure modules have defined '__all__'.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-nb (0.2.6)
item.description: Flake8 based checking for jupyter notebooks
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: nitpick (0.26)
item.description: Enforce the same configuration across multiple projects
